gui

Class SelectionHashList<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.SelectionHashList<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of elements which will be in this data structure

    public class SelectionHashList<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for quickly selecting and iterating over elements.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Maximilian Awiszus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SelectionHashList()
      Creates an empty SelectionHashList.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(T t)
        Insert or update a item in data structure. An inserted element is deselected by default.
        Parameters:
        t - item which will be inserted or updated

      • updateAll

        public void updateAll(java.util.List<T> l)
        Insert or update many elements to the data structure. All inserted elements are deselected by default.
        Parameters:
        l - Element which will be inserted or updated

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Empty data structure / remove all elements including selected items

      • removeAll

        public void removeAll()
        Remove many elements. If element is selected it will remain selected.

      • remove

        public void remove(T t)
        Remove specific element. If element is selected it will remain selected.
        Parameters:
        t - which will be removed.

      • setSelected

        public boolean setSelected(T t,
                  boolean selected)
        Select or deselect an element if it exists in the data structure.
        Parameters:
        t - Element which will be selected / deselected
        selected - is true if element should be selected, false otherwise
        Returns:
        true if list has changed during operation, false otherwise

      • setSelected

        public boolean setSelected(java.lang.Integer id,
                  boolean selected)
        Select or deselect an element if it exists in the data structure.
        Parameters:
        id - of element which should be selected / deselected
        selected - is true if element should be selected, false otherwise
        Returns:
        true if list has changed during operation, false otherwise

      • get

        public java.util.List<T> get()
        Get list of all inserted elements.
        Returns:
        list of insrted elements

      • getSelected

        public java.util.List<T> getSelected()
        Get list of all selected elements.
        Returns:
        list of selected elements

        public T getElement(java.lang.Integer id)
        Get element with specific id
        Parameters:
        id - of element
        Returns:
        element with id or null
